docs.snippet: The Philadelphia Eagles interviewed Mike McCoy, the Denver Broncos’ offensive coordinator, after a lengthy meeting with Oregon Coach Chip Kelly a night earlier....

docs.abstract: Philadelphia Eagles take their coaching search to Denver to interview Broncos offensive coordinator Mike McCoy after lengthy meeting with Oregon coach Chip Kelly night earlier in Arizona.

docs.snippet: Ray Lewis said he wanted to “appreciate the ride” in his final home game with the Ravens, and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ray Lewis said he wanted to “appreciate the ride” in his final home game with the Ravens, and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions.
docs.abstract: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Ray Lewis ends his illustrious 17-year career by contributing to staunch defensive performance that helped Baltimore to a 24-9 victory against the Indianapolis Colts in his final home game; says he wanted 'to appreciate the ride' and Baltimore fans and players shared his emotions.

headline.seo: Poignant Day for Ray Lewis, the Face of a Franchise
headline.main: Poignant Day for the Face of a Franchise

docs.snippet: Mr. Elliott, who played on two unbeaten Michigan teams and was a head coach at four universities (Nebraska, California, Illinois and Miami), later became the longest tenured executive director of the Pro Football Hall of Fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Elliott, who played on two unbeaten Michigan teams and was a head coach at four universities (Nebraska, California, Illinois and Miami), later became the longest tenured executive director of the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
docs.abstract: Pete Elliott, all-American back who played on two unbeaten football teams at the University of Michigan in the late 1940s and played or coached in three Rose Bowl games, dies at age 86.

headline.seo: Pete Elliott, Football All-American and Coach, Dies at 86
